department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: woven wall hanging with overhead view of a hunter wearing a rust-red coat, black pants and grey and brown boots, holding a harpoon and a rope, creeping along ice and snow toward a mottled grey seal in LRC; brown and grey forms at top; sleeve bands at top and bottom with wooden cleats; white twisted rope through top sleeve as hanging cord
inscription: on back of lower sleeve band, LLC: [text in Inuit language] | on back of lower sleeve band, in black ink: #252 CREEPING UP 1/10 32 x 44\" / SARAH MANIAPAK / OLASSIE AKULUKJUK
markings:
on back of top sleeve band, stamped in black: Weaving Shop / Pangnirtung / Baffin Island, N.W.T. / CANADA
see Inscription
title: Creeping Up
